Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Biological Response Modifier/Vaccine/Recombinant Viral Vaccine/RCAS-Ras
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A recombinant retroviral virus derived from SR-A strain of Rous sarcoma virus carrying a human gene encoding the G12D mutant form of K-Ras. The viral vector, RCAS harbors a Replication Competent ALV Splice acceptor. This recombinant virus was use in animal model to study gliomagenesis.
